original_title: KAKSS Supreme Quality Neoprene Dumbbell With Stand 12Kg(1kg+2kg+3kg N #Pair)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set 12kg, Black Cast Iron Weights Dumbbells Set with Stand, 1kg 2kg 3kg Dumbbells Pair Hand Weights for Women and Men, Home Gym Weights Set, non-toxic cast iron dumbell

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Neoprene Dumbbell With Stand 12Kg (1kg+2kg+3kg Pair)
image_analysis.size: 6 dumbbells: 1 KG, 2 KG, 3 KG pairs (total 12 KG)
image_analysis.material: cast iron dumbbells with neoprene coating and plastic storage stand
key_features: Easy-grip neoprene coating for a secure hold
Printed weight number on each dumbbell end in white text
Pack includes 1 KG, 2 KG, and 3 KG dumbbell pairs (total 6 dumbbells)
Includes a compact black dumbbell storage stand/rack
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training and fitness workouts at home or in classes, such as curls, shoulder raises, and other dumbbell exercises.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners, and general exercisers looking for a compact dumbbell set with a stand.
image_analysis.ai_description: A compact black dumbbell set featuring three pairs of neoprene-coated cast iron weights in 1 kg, 2 kg, and 3 kg, each clearly marked in white with the KAKSS logo. The dumbbells rest on a black, tree-shaped plastic stand, creating a tidy, vertical display against a clean background.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Non-toxic, smell-proof neoprene coating keeps workouts fresh and safe at home.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap dumbbells often arrive with strong chemical odours that linger for weeks.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Cast iron core with thick neoprene layer resists chipping and splitting over time.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost vinyl or thin-coated weights crack, peel and expose rusting metal quickly.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Easy-grip, non-slip neoprene stays secure even with sweaty hands for safer lifting.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Glossy plastic or metal handles get slippery, causing drops and hand strain.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Includes a compact, fitted stand to store all 1kg, 2kg, 3kg pairs neatly in one place.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Many sets arrive loose with no rack, cluttering floors and creating trip hazards.
